overview:
Tom Powledge is the Vice President and General Manager of the PC Tools Business Unit at Symantec.

In this role he leads engineering, sales, marketing, strategy, business development, and support for the division. PC Tools develops a wide range of award-winning security and utility software products with global distribution. Prior to his current role, Powledge served as the Vice President of Product Management for the Consumer Business Unit at Symantec, where was responsible for the management of the Norton consumer product line. Powledge joined Symantec in 1995 and served in various product management positions for the Norton-brand consumer software products.
